hero.title: Fighting for Your Rights with Dedication and Integrity
hero.description: Our experienced attorneys are committed to providing personalized legal solutions for immigration, family law, criminal defense, and personal injury cases.

about.title: About Our Firm
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Legal Partner
about.description: With decades of combined experience, our team of dedicated attorneys is committed to achieving the best possible outcomes for our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional legal services with integrity, compassion, and unwavering commitment to our clients' success.

practices.title: Practice Areas
practices.subtitle: Comprehensive Legal Services
practices.description: We offer expert legal representation across multiple practice areas to meet your diverse needs.

immigration.title: Immigration Law
immigration.description: Navigate the complex immigration system with experienced guidance.

family.title: Family Law
family.description: Protect your family's interests with compassionate legal support.

criminal.title: Criminal Defense
criminal.description: Defend your rights with aggressive and strategic representation.

injury.title: Personal Injury
injury.description: Get the compensation you deserve for your injuries.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from the people we've helped navigate their legal challenges.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services.

consultation.question: How do I schedule a consultation?
consultation.answer: You can schedule a free consultation by calling our office or filling out the contact form on our website.

fees.question: What are your fees?
fees.answer: Our fees vary depending on the type of case. We offer free initial consultations to discuss your situation and provide transparent pricing.

timeline.question: How long will my case take?
timeline.answer: Case timelines vary depending on complexity. During your consultation, we'll provide an estimated timeline based on your specific situation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to discuss your case? Contact us today for a free consultation.

home.metaDescription: DELGADO LEGAL, P.A. is a full-service law firm and licensed title agent in Miami Lakes, FL. Real estate closings, estate planning, foreclosure defense, and more.
home.heroDescription: DELGADO LEGAL, P.A. is a full-service law firm and licensed title agent providing expert real estate closings, estate planning, and a variety of legal services throughout South Florida.

realEstateClosings.title: Real Estate Closings
realEstateClosings.description: Smooth real estate transactions from start to finish. Licensed title agent services for buyers, sellers, and agents.
